scripts.start-jenkins-new: docker run -u root -d --name blue-ocean -p 8080:8080 -v jenkins-data:/var/jencd ..kins_home -v npm-cache:/root/.npm -v cypress-cache:/root/.cache jenkinsci/blueocean:latest
scripts.start-jenkins: docker run -u root -d --name blue-ocean -p 8080:8080 -v jenkins-data:/var/jencd ..kins_home -v npm-cache:/root/.npm -v cypress-cache:/root/.cache -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock jenkinsci/blueocean:latest
